subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Summer Squall, who won the 1990 Preakness after finishing second in the Kentucky Derby, was euthanized at Lane’s End Farm in Versailles, Ky. He was 22. Summer Squall finished second in the 1990 Kentucky Derby to Unbridled, then defeated Unbridled in the Preakness after a stretch duel in which he pulled away along the rail. His offspring include the 1999 Kentucky Derby winner Charismatic.
